level.heading: Payment to minor.
level.text: If a financial institution is required or permitted to make payment pursuant to this subchapter to a minor designated as a beneficiary, payment may be made pursuant to Chapter 3 of Title 21 of the District of Columbia Code.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following § 19-601.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 225 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
